title: Berserker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Throwing Axe**: Throw an axe at someone's house, making all visits to them fail.
- **Whirlwind**: Rampage at someone's house.
- **Hunting Net**: Roleblock someone tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can only use one ability per night.
- Your attack power increases with each kill. Maxes at Overkill.
- You automatically use Whirlwind at home when roleblocked.

desc:
Post 3452
*"I got something to axe you.."*
